sthana 23kadi sidu kala sodisi meheyumwalin pasuwa el. ti. ti. ee. samajikayan 10 deneku swistarlantha polisiya magin athadanguwata gena atha.pereda (11) athadanguwata gena athi me thrasthawadin aparadha rasakata sambandha bawata ha mulya wisuddhikaranayata sambandha bawata saka kerena bawa thanapathi aaranchi marga pawasayi.mema thrasthawadin sambandhayen sidu kala mulika parikshanawaladi owun wasara gananawak swistarlanthaye wesena drawida janathawagen mudal laba gena athi bawata anawaranaya karagena atha.thawada swistarlanthaye wesena wides ratawala drawida janathawata wishala naya mudal ganna lesa pawasamin balahathkarayen mudal aya karagena athi athara melesa owunta mudal nodena pudgalayanta tharjanaya kara athi bawada swistarlanthaye nithipathi karyalaya sandahan karayi.melesa swistarlantha prank miliyana gananin mudal upayamin el. ti. ti. ee. sanwidhanayata awi aayudha miladi ganim aadiya sandaha ema mudal el. ti. ti. ee. yata ayath samagam wala aayojanaya kara athayida anawaranaya kara gena atha.mewani thrasthawadin athadanguwata ganima sandaha menma athadanguwata gath pudgalayan sambandhayen thawaduratath parikshana kriyathmaka bawada wartha we..
